entity.name: ASCENDynamics NFP
entity.description: ASCENDynamics NFP is building an open-source collaboration platform for worker-owned cooperatives, nonprofits, and private organisations. Our mission is to empower organisations with data-driven decision-making tools, fostering sustainable growth and addressing societal challenges.

projects.name: ASCENDynamics Collaboration Platform
projects.description: An open-source platform designed for NGOs, worker cooperatives, and nonprofit organisations to streamline collaboration, manage resources, and track volunteer contributions in real-time.

channels.description: Direct bank transfers are available upon request for substantial contributions. Please reach out to us directly.
Support our platform via Stripe with secure credit/debit card transactions.

plans.name: Platform Infrastructure Support
plans.description: Supports ongoing costs for server hosting, database management, and infrastructure maintenance to ensure 24/7 availability and reliability of the ASCENDynamics platform.

plans.name: Full-Time Developer Sponsorship
plans.description: Sponsor a full-time developer to contribute to ASCENDynamics' open-source platform, ensuring continuous improvement, updates, and security enhancements.

plans.name: Part-Time Developer Support
plans.description: Fund part-time developer contributions to focus on specific features, bug fixes, and enhancements.

plans.name: Volunteer Engagement Fund
plans.description: Supports tools, workshops, and events aimed at enhancing volunteer participation, engagement, and onboarding experiences.

plans.name: Goodwill Contribution
plans.description: A flexible plan where contributors can donate any amount as a gesture of support towards our mission.

history.description: Initial setup and research phase, focusing on laying the groundwork for platform architecture.
Prototype development and initial volunteer onboarding processes.
Platform MVP launch with basic collaborative features.
Beta release with additional resource management tools.
Implementation of platform features and developer contributions.
